code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:a 65 year old m electrician presents with moderate sudden onset of extreme anxiety, tremulousness and sweating immediately before public appearances of 3 weeks duration together with moderate feelings of apprehension when taking tests. denies any alcohol use he has approx. a 30 pack/year history of smoking o:Height 65 in, Weight 144 lbs, Temperature 98.2 F, Pulse 75, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 67, Respiration 15 a:Anxiety p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to psychiatry.

td.content: s:pt presents with moderate feelings of apprehension when taking tests and moderate sudden onset of extreme anxiety, tremulousness and sweating immediately before public appearances for 2 days. he has a history of Anxiety for past 2 years. pt is a 65 yr old white M electrician. denies any alcohol use pt reports that he smokes once or twice daily o:Height 66 in, Weight 147 lbs, Temperature 98.4 F, Pulse 76, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 73, Respiration 17 a:Anxiety p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered GAD - 7 Assessment Tool.

content2.Unmatched: denies any alcohol use pt reports that he smokes once or twice daily
